overview: Jessie has two roommates, Freya and Alex, who are in an open relationship. Freya and Alex suspect that Jessie bats for their team, too… • Recently divorced Serene is in the dining room taking selfies when her daughter Madi and her daughter's BFF Lulu walk in. The girls all chat as Serene shares her online dating woes ever since her husband left… • Spencer is ready to shoot some sensual content between Harlow and Chloe. She's just checking her cameras when Harlow and Chloe arrive… • Whitney has always had a bit of a thing for her friend Lena, but she doesn't know that the feeling is mutual…
title: Stealing My Brother's Girlfriend
